author: antelder
msg: Change the Operations for async services to use the sync form. So for example a method 'void operation1Async( String input, ResponseDispatch<String> handler )' would have a Operation named operation1 with a single String arg and a return of type String. This along with the other recent async changes gets async operation working with the data binding framework and jaxb

author: mduerig
msg: refactor: generify ItemState, ItemImpl, HierarchyEntry to reduce casting
